coded_answer.p: I am writing to you about your musical show "OVER THE RAINBOW". I have comecamewent and seesaw it at the theatre but I amwas very disappointed. I have comecamewent to see a good theatreshow but I did not. Danny Brook was goingmeant to be the starring actor but he wasnwas not, another actor took his place. That was very disappointing. The play was goingmeant to start at 19.30 but isit was very delaydelayed. It startstarted at 20.15.

And this is not all, there is more. In the advertisement you writesay that there is a biscountdiscount available but Ititthere was not. Also the restaurant was closed because there was not left any foodany food left.
I think the next time you write an advertimentadvertisement you should writeput in it with the right information.
I did not have a perfect evening with so many proplemsproblems. So, so I am asking you to reternreturngive me some money back.
I hope to hear from you soon.
